name: packing.
description:
CW: non-graphic, implied past sexual intimacy

-

You're almost through your finals. On one hand, thank god, it's been a long-ass first year—but then that means it's almost time to move back home. Your parents are coming on Thursday to help you pack your things, and there's parts of your year- and you- that you can't let them see. Not yet.
It takes you a few minutes to maneuver the empty Costco chip box out from behind your bed.

-

A (semiautobiographical) game about packing, leaving (for) home, and revisiting the closet.
